name: Pwn-fs
body:
### Format String
* In this challenge chain, students can get first-hand experience on exploiting format-string vulnerability.
* In a series of stepwise challenges, students will learn different scanerious after exploiting a format-string vulnerbility, including reading/writing memory value and even changing program flow.


***
* To use this challenge sequence, please make sure you have set up the server [framework](https://github.com/nsslab-yin/SRCTF), then follow the instructions to import the challenge contents.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
